title: Powerhouse Pepper Comics
additional-note: A note in the 1971 CCE Periodicals volume says to 'consult copyright office' for full issue renewal information.  The renewal for the only issue of the 1943 series, mentioned in the July-December 1977 CCE Periodicals volume, was filed in 1971. Powerhouse Pepper would return with his own title in 1948, continuing the numbering of this series.
